	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Sandstorm thought about the question.

Sandstorm: If the Predacons have eno=
ugh men, this could work. A few of us could lead an equal amount of Maximal=
s or more away, give them the impression of dominance, then when they reach=
 some suitable hiding places, the rest of us jump them. Eliminate a few Max=
imals at a time, just until they catch on, and they'll soon he outnumbered.=
 But how to make them notice? ... With some of them we could play off their=
 egos, perhaps, but I'm sure there are those who are looking to be heroes, =
taking out a Predacon alone would seem very "tough" of them, after all.

OO=
C: Forgive me, all of my previous battle strategies were "Let's run up and =
shoot the base!"

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: airly2000 <airly20=
02@...>
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Saturday, March 01, 20=
03 3:18 AM
  Subject: Hydras/Sandstorm: Meeting with all Predacons


  Hydr=
as:

  Hydras looked to sandstorm and said "You must have a lot experience,=
 
  Sandstorm"hissed the male"What do you suggest that we have to do to 
  =
give at Maximals a strong and definitive strike?"
